name: Talk Juliet 2
_source: s;Juliet;So, how'd talking with Morrissey go?
s;Simon;Uh, not bad?{w}{br}I think he wants me to marry his daughter...
s;Juliet;Ha! Can't wait to tell Vincent that one.{w}{br}Is this the type of arrangement you can refuse?
s;Simon;I honestly don't know.{w}{br}He's hard to read.{w}{br}But hey, maybe she's nice and this'll all work out.
s;Juliet;Here's hoping.{w}{br}Glad he seems open to negotiation at least?
s;Simon;Yeah, better than nothing.{w}{br}He just wants to see us train first.{w}{br}Mind helping out?
s;Juliet;Feels a bit weird, but sure thing.{w}{br}I'll see you out there.
